casebody.data:
No. 11-712. EchoStar Satellite L.L.C., nka Dish Network, L.L.C., et al., Petitioners v. NDS Group PLS, nka NDS Group Limited, et al. 565 U.S. 1158, 132 S. Ct. 1118,

181 L. Ed. 2d 981,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 751. January 17, 2012.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 390 Fed. Appx. 764.
